Race.SpecificTitle: Member of School Board -- District C
Chief of Police -- Town of Kentwood
Hammond Area Rec. Dist. #1 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 15 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hammond Area Recreation District No. 1 Proposition

Summary:  Levy and collection of a 15-year, 10 mill property tax for the purpose of construction, acquisition, operation and maintenance of parks, playgrounds, recreation centers and other recreational facilities within the District, including, but not limited
to, new soccer, football, baseball and softball playing fields, a gymnasium and property, furnishings and equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Hammond Area Recreation District No. 1 of Tangipahoa Parish, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a ten (10) mill tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,544,272.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of fifteen (15) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of construction, acquisition, operation and maintenance of parks, playgrounds, recreation centers and other recreational facilities within the District, including, but not limited to, new soccer, football, baseball and softball playing fields, a gymnasium and property, furnishings and equipment therefor, with the proceeds of said tax subject to be funded into bonds for such purposes, commencing January 1, 2011?
